title: Wood Mackenzie Madrid Carbon Briefing
author: unknown
text:
On Thursday the 21st of November, Wood Mackenzie will be hosting a Carbon Afternoon Briefing in Madrid. Our experts will be presenting our latest views of carbon policy, carbon markets and decarbonisation technologies, and how these topics impact EU industries now and the in the future. The briefing will cover the following topics: Carbon and emissions policy drivers Compliance carbon markets and CBAM Voluntary carbon markets and carbon offsets CCUS and carbon removals High-level timings: Registration: 15:30 - 16:00 Presentation: 16:00 - 17:00 Networking drinks: 17:00 - 18:00 Please complete the form to register your interest in attending Our speakers Mhairidh Evans VP, Global Head of CCUS Research Mhairidh leads our global research on carbon capture, utilisation and storage (CCUS).
